title: Moinul Islam
text:
I am Dr. Moinul Islam, working as an assistant professor at Kochi University of Technology. I have received my Ph.D. in engineering degree from Kyushu University in 2016. My research focuses are:
I have extensive experience to conduct experimental research by using the methods of online experiment, field experiment and laboratory experiment. Based on the experimental data analysis, my goal is to identify and develop suitable policy framework that will contribute to the policies for sustainable environments and societies.

title: Moinul Islam
text:
Working experience

2020, Assistant Professor, Research Institute for Future Design, Kochi University of Technology, Kochi, Japan
2019, Assistant Professor, Graduate School for International Development and Cooperation (IDEC), Hiroshima University, Hiroshima, Japan
2016, Assistant Professor, Graduate School of Urban and Environmental Engineering, Kyushu University, Fukuoka, Japan
2012, Research Assistant, Graduate School of Environmental Studies, Tohoku University, Sendai, Japan
